      • getVector

        public Vector3D getVector(double x,
                          double y,
                          double z)
        Returns a vector with direction from given point to the this point. equivalent of P = this - point(x,y,z).
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        z - z coordinate
        Returns:
        Vector3D object, direction vector.

      • getVector

        public Vector3D getVector(Point3D point)
        Returns a vector with direction from given point to the this point. equivalent of P = this - point.
        Parameters:
        point - Point3D object
        Returns:
        Vector3D object, direction vector.

      • getDirVector

        public static Vector3D getDirVector(Point3D p1,
                                    Point3D p2)
        returns direction vector from point p1 to point p2.
        Parameters:
        p1 - origin point
        p2 - end point
        Returns:
        Vector3D object, direction vector.

      • combine

        public void combine(Point3D point)
        Combines current point with a given point. The current position of the point is changed to the geometric mean of two points. The point in the argument is unchanged.
        Parameters:
        point - Point3D point to calculate geometric mean.
